text: Yiniharu samaksa sansarako jindagiko udaharana pani varnana garnus (tyo yasto cha) jastai pani jasala'i hami akasabata varsayaum ta yasabata prthviko vanaspati umrayo pheri tutaphuta bha'era ghana bha'i paraspara guthihale tara tyasala'i havale uda'idincha allaha nai hareka kuromathi samathryavana cha
